title: Olympian Heartbreak
description: This is the second book in the Olympian Love trilogy, not a stand-alone volume. When Sabrina finds out that the man she's in love with, Nikos, has returned to Greece with her rival Maggie, she's heartbroken. But a surprising invitation to go to Athens gives her hope. Once they reconnect in the land of the gods, their passion grows stronger and Nikos reassures her there's nothing going on between him and Maggie. However, her insecurities increase after she learns he's hiding secrets from his past. Who's the woman in the photograph? What happened in the island of Santorini? Before she can get the questions answered, their passionate week is suddenly interrupted when Nikos is faced with a tragic situation. Will Sabrina make the ultimate sacrifice to help him?
author: Andrya Bailey
